cards.name: Apotheosis
cards.description: Upgrade ALL cards in your deck. Exhaust.

cards.name: Bandage Up
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Heal 1 HP.

cards.name: Blind
cards.description: Enemy loses 2 Strength. Lasts 2 turns. Exhaust.

cards.name: Chrysalis
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength. Gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Dark Shackles
cards.description: Enemy loses 2 Strength. Lasts this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Deep Breath
cards.description: Add 2 Strikes to your hand. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Discovery
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Dramatic Entrance
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Add 2 Dazed to your hand.

cards.name: Enlightenment
cards.description: Gain 1 Temporary HP for each card in your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Finesse
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 Block.

cards.name: Flash of Steel
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Forethought
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. Attach an Ascender's Bane to this card.

cards.name: Good Instincts
cards.description: Gain 3 Block. Apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

cards.name: Hand of Greed
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Gain 1 Gold for each card played this turn.

cards.name: Impatience
cards.description: Apply 1 Frail to a random enemy.

cards.name: Jack of All Trades
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 Block. Gain 1 Gold. Apply 1 Weak to a random enemy.

cards.name: Madness
cards.description: This turn, whenever you play a card, play a copy of it. Exhaust.

cards.name: Magnetism
cards.description: Whenever a card is played, gain 1 Temporary HP.

cards.name: Master of Strategy
cards.description: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 Block. Gain 1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Mayhem
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, play it again automatically next turn. Ethereal.

cards.name: Metamorphosis
cards.description: Exhaust all Wounds and Dazed in your deck. Heal 1 HP for each.

cards.name: Mind Blast
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. This card costs 1 more for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Panache
cards.description: This turn, whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

cards.name: Panic Button
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. Shuffle a Curse into your draw pile.

cards.name: Panacea
cards.description: Remove a random Status card from your hand. Heal 4 HP.

cards.name: Purity
cards.description: Add 2 Strikes and 2 Defends to your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sadistic Nature
cards.description: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies. Vulnerable.

cards.name: Secret Technique
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Secret Weapon
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Upgrade ALL cards in your hand.

cards.name: Swift Strike
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Bomb
cards.description: Deal 40 damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Thinking Ahead
cards.description: Add 1 random Skill to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Transmutation
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 cards to create a copy of and add to your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Trip
cards.description: Apply 3 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy. Exhaust.

cards.name: Violence
cards.description: This turn, whenever you play an Attack, gain 3 additional Strength.
